name: Bechdel Test
content:
Description: Data on the movies released from 1970-2013 and how they fared on the [Bechdel Test](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bechdel_test).

Source: [Tidy Tuesday](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/blob/master/data/2021/2021-03-09/readme.md)

Accompanying Article: [FiveThirtyEight](https://fivethirtyeight.com/features/the-dollar-and-cents-case-against-hollywoods-exclusion-of-women/) 

Columns:

* year (string): the year the movie was released
* title (string): title of the movie
* test result (string): whether the movie passes or fails the [Bechdel Test](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bechdel_test)
* budget (numerical): the total budget used to make the movie, in dollars
* domgross (numerical): the amount of money the movie grossed domestically in the year it was released, in dollars
* intgross (numerical): the amount of money the movie grossed internationally in the year it was released, in dollars
* plot(string): a summary of the plot of the movie
* rated (string): the rating of the movie
* poster (string): a url for an image of the movie's poster
